entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'ConvertOrWidenPrimitivesEnumsAndPointersIfPossible' in NativeAOT is unnecessarily rooting 'BigInteger' (and a bunch more stuff) due to 'Convert.*' calls #101821
  • Merge nested branches into AND test #101820
  • ngen PdbWriter missing applying textSectionOffset to cold methods #101815
  • [workloads] add wbt that checks downlevel runtime versions. #101809
    9.0.0
  • SIGSEGV in Finalizer thread calling SafeX509Handle.ReleaseHandle #101804
  • Crash when pre-loading libjemalloc.so on Debian 12 #101795
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Threading.RateLimiting.RateLimiter.AcquireAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken); #101793
  • [8.0] [Installer] Failure in command: rpm2cpio netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1.0-x64.rpm | cpio -idmv #101788
  • Different behavior of HttpClient depending on OS. Digest authentication #101787
  • JIT: ARM64 `Assertion failed 'isScalableVectorSize(size)'` #101786

Closed

  • Large Memory Consumption in Docker Causing OOM #98524
  • Random malloc failures on current Debian Bookworm slim image #101722
  • Failing test - `System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.ThreadPoolMinMaxThreadsEventTest` on Linux/arm64 #95873
  • NET 8 Application crashes without a StackTrace Code: 0xc0000409 #100335
    Future
  • Test failure: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfigTester/TestConfigTester.dll #100217
  • Test failure GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #93162
  • Segmentation fault on .NET 6 - Linux Ubuntu 18.04 #97467
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\CollectionCountTest\\CollectionCountTest.cmd #93905
  • [arm64] JIT: Volatile.Write emits full memory barrier for floats #67254
    9.0.0
  • `ExecutionEngineException` is thrown by `Environment.FailFast` #101816
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ManagedDelay test failure #96585
  • [wasm] perf: AOT `CompileError: WebAssembly.Module(): Compiling function #116384:"System_Linq_Expressions_System_Linq_Expressions..." failed: not enough arguments on the stack for call (need 4, got 2) ` #94431
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.HttpRequest_BodylessMethod_NoContentLength throwing FormatException #101399
  • WasmTestOnChrome-System.Runtime.Tests.WorkItemExecution fails with exit code 3221226505 #101464
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Stack overflow in linking with emcc #101467
    9.0.0
  • Long Running Test: System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers #101522
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `FillAsync` and `FillSchemaAsync` to `DataAdapter` #101704

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi][windows] Disable the wasi-aot-library tests on windows #101827
    area-Build-mono
  • Simplify our global new/delete implementations #101826
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] Update cdac-build-tool to omit type when it is empty #101825
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove assert #101824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Pin net7.0 to 7.0.19 #101823
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Test #101822
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move issue links from comments to the warning attributes in trimming tests. #101819
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Connection Activities in SocketsHttpHandler #101814
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [workloads] Bump downlevel runtime produced package versions in the workload manifest #101806
    NO-MERGE, area-Workloads
  • Remove utilcodestaticnohost from superpmi #101803
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ensure the scalar Reciprocal*Estimate APIs use AVX512 where possible #101800
    area-System.Numerics
  • Expose DOTNET_JitNoInline in Release #101798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add top-level controls for VMR to enable/disable system lbiraries #101797
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Trim instructionset name in helper #101794
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Mark swift error as busy before call definition RefPosition #101792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] SVE Cleanup: Merging SVE_AE_3A, SVE_AN_3A, SVE_EP_3A, SVE_ER_3A, SVE_ET_3A, SVE_EU_3A into SVE_AA_3A #101785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve

Merged

  • Use the standard nothrow tag instead of our own type #101811
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump to 8.0.5 #101818
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging]: Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #101737
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.6
  • Revert Enable repackaging of NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack #101518 #101812
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix PublishAot single warning issue for ProjectReferences #101799
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview4] Bump downlevel runtime produced package versions in the workload manifest #101807
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "disable optimizations for PopCount (#99796)" #101245
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Remove LSRA arm32 quirk #101791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64: Optimize Volatile.Read/Write for floats #101359
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Track sideness of arrOp in GetCheckedBoundArithInfo #100968
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] Sigsegv when calling a virtual method via UnsafeAccessorAttribute #101649
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.6
  • Backport #92375 and #93082 to release/8.0-staging #101744
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Don't run AOT smoke tests on Firefox #101802
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix Lock spin-waiting on single-proc machines #101513
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Notify the debugger of a cross-thread dependency in Lock #101501
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #101684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix some TensorPrimitives tests failing for me locally with checked builds #101745
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Process all register kills in bulk in LSRA #101760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to reduce cost of Async #101605
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101290
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #101783
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #101784
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.31 #101776
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 8.0.6 #101779
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Optimize Guid's GreaterThan operator to use 64bit compare. #100158
    area-System.Runtime, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [Testing] Backport #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101703
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • JIT: synthesize PGO if no schema, when dynamic PGO is active #101739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Don't enable use-after-return checking on Apple's Clang #101781
    area-Infrastructure
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Porting `SuspendAllThreads` from the NativeAOT to CoreCLR. #101782
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Refactor AdvSimd version of DecodeFromUTF8 #101620
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add simple bitwise ops #101762
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Bulk copy of byrefs #101761
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable cross-block local assertion prop for natural loops #101763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: profiled SpanHelpers.Fill #98879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement getStaticFieldCurrentClass for NAOT #96982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Typename parsing cleanup #101767
    area-System.Reflection
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenApi generate wrong interface when passing wrong --assembly-reference path #40639
  • `dotnet workload uninstall` cannot find workload returned by `dotnet workload list` #40631
  • `dotnet workload clean` is fails due to invalid package signature #40629

Closed

  • `dotnet tool install` ignores $DOTNET_ROOT and defaults to $HOME/.dotnet #39019
  • CONTAINER2005 error raised by containing publishing if project name is all capital letters #40501
  • `Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers` version '8.0.202' warning is incorrect on `8.0.1xx` SDK #39931
  • Directories with a dot as the first character of the directory name not included in published container images #40511

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #40644
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40643
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #40642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow through generated container image names to callers #40638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] update warning message for containers package inclusion #40628
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Use Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat images by default starting in 8.0.300 #39614
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Update branding to 6.0.423 #40610
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.131 #40609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.106 #40614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.301 #40616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix dotnet/msbuild#10004 by making TL quiet on dotnet new's implicit restore #40630
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Fix CONTAINER2005 error from all caps project name #40626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Fix missing files from container images when directory name starts with dot #40624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the pool for linux shortstack builds #40627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix CONTAINER2005 error from all caps project name #40512
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix missing files from container images when directory name starts with dot #40513
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Prevent the Roslyn compiler package from being used on .NET Core MSBuild #39666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Have --no-restore imply -restore:false to override any response file command-line arguments #40579
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Opt into client side STJ serialization #73317
  • Wrong boxing with IEquatable<T> ? #73310
  • False positive: CS8600 - Converting null literal or possible null value to non-nullable type #73306
  • CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #73304
    17.11
  • Intellisense not recognizes extension methods for generic classes from .NET Standard 2.0 references #73302
    Backlog
  • VS2022 - configure severity doesnt work, broken, doesnt do anything..??? #73301
  • Collection expression conversion failure should result in element-wise diagnostics #73297

Closed

  • var and type apparent for nullable types #73312
  • Code clean up does not work for only selected files. #73303
    17.11
  • Using IDisposable will dispose before Task Continuation is completed. #73264
  • Corrección de datos imai #73298
  • Editorconfig in nuget package is not respected if slashes in source file path do not exactly match slashes in .editorconfig path #72657
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #73318
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add intellisense support for extension types. #73315
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions #73314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add AutomationPeer for inheritance marign glyph #73311
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces

Merged

  • Expose some useful helper methods #73289
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic to use a switch expression #73313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Resolve extension members in all non-invocation contexts #73239
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Replay updates #73308
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move large static array out of hte large object heap #73299
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge branch 'main' into features/RefInAsync #73300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Pull reading of last storage subsystem out of lock (part2) #73295
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle ref safety analysis for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73281
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Ensure source paths are comparable with editorconfig directory paths #73100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Lower drop retention from 10 years to 3 months #73190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Pull reading of last storage subsystem out of lock #73294
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [WIP] Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Partial properties: diagnostics for mismatch between parts #73250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Opt into stj serialization on LSPclient #72675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix infinite load loop loading WPF projects in VSCode #72625
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Razor fallback changes #73001
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI and Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 8.0.2+ adds webview2Loader.dll and msalruntime.dll resulting in app not starting #55503
  • Build failure on github.com/dotnet/dotnet codespace #55499
  • Shared memory between created TestServers of individual WebApplicationFactories #55497
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #55493
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, updates #55492
  • Remote authenticators violate CSP form-action 'self' #55491
  • Process memory grows with each request #55490
  • After deleting a class member from the. net core and hot reloading, it is still possible to obtain this class member through reflection #55486
  • NullReferenceException in get_RequestAborted from SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter.WriteResponseBodyAsync #55484
  • CreatedResult does not set StatusCode #55483
    9.0-preview5
  • InputSelect displays incorrect value after updating select list #55478
  • asp-for incorrectly handling lists removals in onPost #55477
  • Quarantine ProtectedUserStoreTest.CanFindById #55476
    9.0-preview6
  • Quarantine MultipleCallsShareExecution_MostCancel #55474

Closed

  • Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55368
    Infrastructure
  • Run the .NET WebAssembly runtime in release mode in published Blazor apps #55438
    9.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #55376
  • .NET 8 stable version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer #55456
  • Change PropertyNameCaseInsensitive's default value to false. #50333
  • Getting random WebSocket failed connection of Blazor Server Application hosted on an Azure App Service #55442
  • add Flexible Authorisation to default templates #55413
  • Error while adding user to role if AutoSaveChanges is false #55433
  • IDictionary does not inherit from IReadOnlyDictionary #55487
  • Signalr hubconnection new parameter .WithStatefulReconnect #55473
  • ASP0018 does not work with non-literals #51855
    Discussions
  • Upgrade Polly to v8 in Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly #55356
  • Fixt #55481
  • Thawt #55480
  • BindAsync doesn't support returning ValidationErrors #51318

PullRequests

Created

  • 1es-ify IdentityModel test pipeline #55505
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Add internal pipeline to test IdentityModel nightlies #55504
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55502
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55501
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `6d79997` #55498
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • removing pure comment #55496
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Set status code on CreatedResult types #55494
    area-mvc
  • Fix generating XML doc comments for query parameters in gRPC JSON transcoding #55482
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Add internal pipeline for IdentityModel nightlies #55500
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55467
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Remove triggers for release/7.0 #55495
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Add a key management simulator for data protection #55348
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-preview5
  • Set default devcontainer to 8 cores #55479
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0] Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #55230
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0] Switch off of -pt images #55461
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `77afe8e` to `d83fee1` #55446
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0] Change how ANCM recycles app #55288
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate error.type tags in metrics #55301
    Servicing-approved, area-hosting, 8.0.6
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `77afe8e` to `d83fee1` #55447
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.31
  • [release/6.0] Switch off of -pt images #55462
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.31
  • Update milestones for June #55489
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Update branding to 6.0.31 #55470
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.31
  • Update branding to 8.0.6 #55472
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.5
  • Quarantine MultipleCallsShareExecution_MostCancel #55475
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Enable trimming for OpenAPI package #55465
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SetTitleBar not working on Windows #22178
  • MAUI Error : None of the input catalogs contained a matching stickers icon set or app icon set named "AppIcons" #22177
  • iOS Release build crashing. #22173
  • FlyoutPage Shadow works incorrectly on iOS #22169
  • Blazor Hybrid Hello World - Windows - The project doesn't know how to run the profile with name 'Windows Machine' and command 'MsixPackage #22167
  • Maui Android app icon does not scale - Workaround required #22166
  • The TapGestureRecognizer does not function properly when the view is clipped. #22164
  • CollectionView - ItemsUpdatingScrollMode="KeepScrollOffset" does not work in Windows #22162

Closed

  • CollectionView scrolling not working when using SwipeView (only in iOS) #22165
  • ios flyout page #22174
  • iOS : No Route to Host on LAN #22154
  • visionOS support #22171
  • Error on right click on Entry control in different Windows #18853
  • iOS platform-specific safe area layout not working with control template #18501
  • .net sdk style dev #22160

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨

Merged

  • Support manual triggering of similar issues #22176
  • Create similarIssues.yml which automatically comments with similar issues on the repo #22170
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖

Updated

  • Fixed android toolbar icon change #20166
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Contains on concrete ReadOnlyCollection in subquery does not translate #33664
  • GroupBy and sum issues #33663
  • Null reference when calling SaveChangesAsync method using transaction scope - Distributed transaction - Oracle and MSSQL #33662

Closed

  • Strange behavior when doing a Select (client side) after results are loaded #33666
  • nullability wrong when select is used #33656
  • Normalize .Count != 0 to Any() in preprocessing #33644
    9.0.0-preview5
  • Cosmos: Values passed to `WithPartionKey` should be model values, not store values #33535
    9.0.0-preview5
  • Why can't a CosmosDB partition key be an int when working with EF Core? #28265
    9.0.0-preview5
  • Cosmos db Hierarchical Partitions in EF Core #28186
    9.0.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/2.1] Fix artifact publishing #33665
    tell-mode

Merged

  • Update dependencies.props #33655
  • Support hierarchical partition keys in Cosmos provider #33536
    breaking-change
  • Normalize .Count != 0 to Any() in preprocessing #33654

Updated

  • Pregenerate SQL for precompiled queries #33510
